tool_description: Explore recipes, craft meal plans, generate shopping lists, receive recipe recommendations, and unlock additional features – all in one place.
name: All in one Recipe API
title: All in one Recipe API

api_list.name: recipeByCategory
api_list.description: return lists of recipes based on the category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-in-one-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com/categories/chicken"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-in-one-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-in-one-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com/categories/{category_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-in-one-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
